answers.answer: Many factors can cause this. Maybe it is due to your age. Men over 50 start to experience this. Sometimes known medical problems can cause less or no ejaculation. I would suggest a visit to a specialist so he could lead to a solution. You ave to know that most cases are curable.Take care

Hello,There are many causes for such symptoms.Important ones are unrealistic sexual expectations which make sex a task rather than a pleasure,negative feelings about non performance,neurological causes which causes difficulty in ejaculation,retrograde ejaculation due to diabetes, damage or injury to the prostate such as due to prostate surgery and certain medications,surgical removal of the prostate or bladder or radiation therapy for certain malignancies of the reproductive system.I would suggest a urologist’s evaluation for this.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: im 55 yr old male who has no ejaculation what causes that
title: sperm count
